00013 char *asctime(const struct tm *timeptr) {
00014     static char wday_name[7][3] = {
00015         "Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"
00016     };
00017 
00018     static char mon_name[12][3] = {
00019         "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun",
00020         "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec"
00021     };
00022 
00023     static char result[26];
00024 
00025     /*sprintf(result, "%.3s %.3s%3d %.2d:%.2d:%.2d %d",
00026         wday_name[timeptr->tm_wday],
00027         mon_name[timeptr->tm_mon],
00028         timeptr->tm_mday, timeptr->tm_hour,
00029         timeptr->tm_min, timeptr->tm_sec,
00030         1900 + timeptr->tm_year);*/
00031 
00032     sprintf(result, "%.2d/%.3s/%3d:%.2d:%.2d:%.2d",
00033         timeptr->tm_mday,
00034         mon_name[timeptr->tm_mon],
00035         1900 + timeptr->tm_year,
00036          timeptr->tm_hour,
00037         timeptr->tm_min, timeptr->tm_sec);
00038 
00039     return result;
00040 }

00042 int write_logentry(char *msg, char *component, int flag) {
00043         FILE *fd;
00044         char entry_msg[MAX_ENTRY_LENGTH];
00045         int choice = flag;
00046         
00047         time_t now = time(NULL);
00048         char *current_time = asctime(localtime(&now));
00049         
00050         if ( NULL == (fd = fopen(LOGFILE, "a")) ) {
00051                 return -1;
00052         }
00053 
00054         switch (choice) {
00055                 case UNKNOWN: sprintf(entry_msg, "UNKNOWN\t[%s] %15s - %s\n", current_time, component, msg);
00056                               break;
00057                 case ERR_FLAG: sprintf(entry_msg, "ERROR\t[%s] %15s - %s\n", current_time, component, msg);
00058                                break;
00059                 case WARN_FLAG: sprintf(entry_msg, "WARNING\t[%s] %15s - %s\n", current_time, component, msg);
00060                                break;
00061                 case INFO_FLAG: sprintf(entry_msg, "INFO\t[%s] %15s - %s\n", current_time, component, msg);
00062                                break;
00063                 default: sprintf(entry_msg, "UNKNOWN\t[%s] %15s - %s\n", current_time, component, msg);
00064         }
00065 
00066         fprintf(fd, "%s", entry_msg);
00067                 
00068         fclose(fd);
00069 
00070 }
